sect1.title: Creating the halt script
sect1.para: A new file /etc/init.d/halt is created containing the following:
sect1.literallayout:
cat > halt << "EOF" #!/bin/sh # Begin /etc/init.d/halt
# # Call halt. See man halt for the meaning of the parameters #
/sbin/halt -d -f -i -p
# End /etc/init.d/halt EOF
